s-1.ptxt: REMOVE FOG LIGHT ASSEMBLY LH (w/ Fog Light)

s2.ptxt: Detach the 2 guides and remove the fog light assembly LH.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE FOG LIGHT ASSEMBLY RH (w/ Fog Light)

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE FOG LIGHT COVER LH (w/ Fog Light)

s2.ptxt: Detach the 4 claws and remove the fog light cover LH.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE FOG LIGHT COVER RH (w/ Fog Light)

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE FRONT BUMPER SIDE MOULDING LH (w/ Plated Moulding)

s2.ptxt: Detach the 5 claws and remove the front bumper side moulding LH.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE FRONT BUMPER SIDE MOULDING RH (w/ Plated Moulding)

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE FRONT BUMPER HOLE COVER LH (w/o Fog Light)

s2.ptxt: Detach the 4 claws and front bumper hole cover LH.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE FRONT BUMPER HOLE COVER RH (w/o Fog Light)

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s2.ptxt: Detach the 24 claws and lower No. 1 radiator grille.
Remove the front bumper No. 2 protector.

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the front bumper No. 2 protector.
Use the same procedure for both front bumper reinforcement plates.

s2.ptxt: Remove the front bumper reinforcement plate.
